chapters.title: Welcome to the Semantic Treasure Hunt!
chapters.description: Begin your quest in the enchanting land of Wordville! Meet your guide, Semanti, the wise owl, who will take you on a journey to uncover the secrets of semantic search.
chapters.learning_goal: Understand the basic concept of words having multiple meanings and how context defines it.

chapters.title: Dancing with Dictionary Dragons
chapters.description: Put on your dancing shoes and step into the Dictionary Dungeon! Every time the music stops, a dictionary dragon challenges you to a word duel. Only by understanding exactly what the word means in the context of the sentence can you make the dragon dance away!
chapters.learning_goal: Learn how context determines the meaning of a word by matching words to their specific meanings.

chapters.title: The Movie Magic Maze
chapters.description: Enter the vibrant Movie Magic Maze! Each turn reveals a scene from your favorite films. Help characters understand each other by connecting related concepts. Every correct connection lights a path forward!
chapters.learning_goal: Explore how related concepts and synonyms enhance understanding and how connections are made in semantics.

chapters.title: Jive with Synonym Sharks
chapters.description: Splash into the Synonym Sea! The Synonym Sharks love a good jive. Match similar meanings to make pairs and create an underwater symphony. Beware: mismatches might summon the mighty semantic wave!
chapters.learning_goal: Grasp how synonyms play a central role in language similarity in semantic search.

chapters.title: The Context Conundrum
chapters.description: Step into the mysterious Gallery of Context! Paint a picture of understanding by solving riddles that alter meaning based on surroundings. Every correct answer adds color to your masterpiece!
chapters.learning_goal: Understand how context can change the shades of meaning in different scenarios.

chapters.title: Dance to the Tone Tune
chapters.description: Rythm is key! In the Musical Domain Dome, help wordbirds sing their songs in the right emotion. Choose the tones and watch the wordbirds perform the enchanting semantic symphony!
chapters.learning_goal: Learn the impact of tone and emotional context in semantic understanding.

chapters.title: Semantic Search Showdown
chapters.description: It's game time! Face a formidable opponent in the Semantic Arena. Employ everything you've learned. From context and synonyms to tones and connections, use these skills to win the ultimate prize!
chapters.learning_goal: Combine all elements learned to simulate the process of semantic search in an engaging challenge.
